name: Flying Monster Insect
description:
*** Flying Monster Insect ***

***Now with VENUS FLYTRAP enemy!!!

Do you love monster? What about creepy flying ones? This creepy crawly insect will really freak you out. He's got one huge eye and wings - PLUS - special magical abilities. This is the stuff that dream are made of. Take control of this monster as he flies around in this beautifully created 3D insect world. Create your colony, feed the king, find Worker and attack monsters, and hunt down the insect bosses. The ultimate creepy crawly insect simulator you have been looking for. Don't forget about the Venus flytrap enemy!!

***Customize your creature***
***Special Magic Attacks Included***


Loaded with all your favorite bugs!! You will also find yourself in head to head battles against Ant colonies, Scorpions, Spiders, Praying Mantis, Butterflies, Wasp, Honey Bees, Venus Flytraps, Beetles, and Dragonflies. Insect hunting has never been more fun and engaging!

Top Game Features:
*** Totally action packed
*** Monster Plant Enemies
*** Sting Attack Strike
*** Magic Shock and Fireball Attacks
*** Huge 3D Insect World Map
*** Open World Style RPG game
*** Fast paced and action packed animal simulator
*** Part survival and part animal simulator


Be sure to check us out on Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/wildfootgames

Big Thanks to everyone for all the awesome feedback! We are super excited about our most recent insect series of games - aptly named "Insecto". But wow do we have something in store for you coming up soon. Some massive long form animal simulators are currently in the development pipeline. Stay tuned! Be sure to send us an email at wildfootwork1@gmail.com and let us know how we are doing. Thanks again for playing, enjoy!!
